EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_SpringOne_Platform_2018.S1Tour - 7-31-18
EmailTemplate.subject: Exclusive discount to SpringOne Platform inside
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, Did you love the SpringOne Tour? Do you want more? Well, we’ve got you covered.
From September 24–27 in Washington, D.C., Pivotal will host its annual user conference, SpringOne Platform <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-s1tour-2018]]>. It’s the conference for those who build, deploy, and run cloud-native software. SpringOne Platform will be filled with Spring talks and session tracks <[[https://springoneplatform.io/2018/sessions?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-s1tour-2018]]>, and is ideally suited for all Spring skill levels. Sessions include Cloud-Native Java with Spring Cloud Services, Going Cloud-Native with Spring Cloud Azure, and many others!
Use the special discount code Attendee_SpringOneTour_100 <[[https://2018.event.springoneplatform.io/register/registration/select?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-s1tour-2018]]> for $100 off your registration.
I hope to see you there, Kathryn
© 2018 Pivotal Software, Inc. 875 Howard Street, Fifth Floor, San Francisco, CA 94103. Published in the USA. <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-training-agenda-email]]>Unsubscribe <[[http://connect.pivotal.io/UnsubscribePage.html]]>. Manage your subscription preferences <[[http://connect.pivotal.io/subscription-management.html]]>.
